objects.text:
• Adjustable Height from 19" to 24.5"
• Hidden Compartment & Storage Shelf
• Modern Design for Living Room

product_details.description: Overall size of coffee table: 41”L x 19.5”W x 19”-24.5 H. Adjustable Height: Coffee table´s innovative design with hidden compartment and lift tabletop can be adjusted vertically from 19’’ to 24.5 to meet your different demands of desired height. Just lifting it effortlessly, there is extra storage room provided. And the stability will also be guaranteed while adjusting. Storage Construction: Made of chipboard, solid wood and metal piece, Tangkula coffee table features large storage rooms with 3 divided storage design, which can well accommodate your various kinds of accessories or stuffs, such as your notebooks, glasses or other things. Practicable Design: Our coffee table is widely applied in office or home as a perfect coffee table or living room furniture for its spacious work area. Its compact structure and beautiful texture can surprisingly highlight your office or home decor, perfect for your office, living room, or study. Brand - Tangkula ** Product Dimensions - 19"D x 41"W x 24.5"H ** Maximum Weight Recommendation - 220 Pounds ** Color - White ** Product Care Instructions - Wipe with Dry/Damp Cloth **

banner_details:
The banner is designed with a clean and modern layout, split vertically into two color-blocked halves, showcasing a promotional sales graphic for a product. On the left side, a bold, multi-line header (`heading`) stands out, followed by a smaller slogan or descriptor text (`tagline`) detailing the product’s purpose. Beneath this is a list of product features (`description`). A highlighted price tag (`price`) sits prominently lower, and a solid call-to-action button shaped from a rectangle (`cta_background`) with overlaid text (`cta`) invites interaction. On the right half is a product image (`product_image`) prominently displayed for visual focus. Background patterns and subtle gridlines add structure and balance to the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream White (#F5F1EB)
- Light Taupe (#EAE5DD)
- Rich Coffee Brown (#6B4226)
- Warm Chestnut (#8B5A3B)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a modern, multi-functional coffee table with a clean and minimalist design. The dominant color is a crisp white (#FFFFFF), used for the main body, evoking simplicity and neatness. The tabletop features a warm walnut brown (#6B4F3B), providing contrast and elegance. Accents from the decor, such as the sage green ceramic object (#9BA17B) and light grey book (#D3D3D3), add subtle sophistication. The colors are used strategically: white highlights structure and brightness, brown adds warmth, and soft tones from the decor create a balanced blend. Ideal banner colors include white, walnut brown, sage green, and muted grey tones.
